Sentencas: Heterogeneous La-doped CeO2 (LCO)-ZnO nanocomposites have been synthesized via a facile wet-chemical approach for multifunctional applications.
Titulo: Semiconductor-ionic properties and device performance of heterogeneous La-doped CeO2-ZnO nanocomposites

Sentencas: It is found that such LCO-ZnO with the Zn/Ce ratio of 9:1 demonstrates the highest photoactivity under visible light irradiation.
Titulo: Semiconductor-ionic properties and device performance of heterogeneous La-doped CeO2-ZnO nanocomposites

Sentencas: Apart from the photocatalytic application, this material has also been used as the electrolyte membrane of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Semiconductor-ionic properties and device performance of heterogeneous La-doped CeO2-ZnO nanocomposites

Sentencas: The best device of SOFC composed of 10% LCO-ZnO composite achieved 922 mW cm(-2) output along with an open circuit voltage of 1.10 V at 550 degrees C. Heterogeneous semiconductor-ionic composite of the heterogeneous LCO-ZnO nanocomposite result in high charge-hole pairs separation and ionic conduction which attributes the efficient multifunctional activity of the synthesized material.
Titulo: Semiconductor-ionic properties and device performance of heterogeneous La-doped CeO2-ZnO nanocomposites

Sentencas: The built-in field directed at the junction may promote ions (H+ and O-2(-))
Titulo: Semiconductor-ionic properties and device performance of heterogeneous La-doped CeO2-ZnO nanocomposites

Sentencas: transport to pass through the semiconductor-ionic LCO-ZnO membrane layer.
Titulo: Semiconductor-ionic properties and device performance of heterogeneous La-doped CeO2-ZnO nanocomposites

Sentencas: This work is the first discovery on the LCO-ZnO semiconductor-ionic materials as a potential candidate for renewable energies to electricity conversions.
Titulo: Semiconductor-ionic properties and device performance of heterogeneous La-doped CeO2-ZnO nanocomposites
